title: 📋 Attendance Management System
description: A Python-based system to manage and track student attendance efficiently with reporting features.

title: ☁️ Weather Application
description: Real-time weather forecasting app using HTML, CSS, JS, and a Weather API. Features current, hourly, and daily forecasts.

title: 💱 Currency Converter
description: A responsive currency converter using API integration to convert currencies in real-time.

title: 🛒 Amazon & Netflix Clone
description: UI clones of Amazon and Netflix created with HTML, CSS, JS. Simulates product listings and media streaming pages.

title: 🍔 Food Order & 🛍️ Shopping Cart System
description: Python-powered food ordering and shopping cart system with product management and billing features.
